DocAttribute.Name: Axis
DocAttribute.Documentation: The exact direction of the local Z Axis.

DocAttribute.Name: RefDirection
DocAttribute.Documentation: The direction used to determine the direction of the local X Axis. If necessary an adjustment is made to maintain orthogonality to the Axis direction. If RefDirection is omitted, the direction is taken from the curve tangent at Location.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR2
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The _Axis_ and _RefDirection_ shall not be parallel or anti-parallel.
